articles.author: Spencer Kimball
articles.title: Oil prices jump after Ukraine strikes Russian oil refineries - CNBC
articles.description: Ukrainian drones hit a Rosneft refinery in the Ryazan region about 130 miles from Moscow and the Novoshakhtinsk refinery in the Rostov region.
articles.content:
Crude oil futures jumped Wednesday after Ukraine struck refineries in Russia, underlining risks to production and fuel supplies from the war in Eastern Europe.
